Classes/Message.html#/s:vC13VertxEventBu.name: isSend
Classes/Message.html#/s:vC13VertxEventBu.abstract: True if this message was the result of a send (vs. publish)

Classes/Message.html#/s:FC13VertxEventBu.name: reply(body:headers:replyTimeout:callback:)
Classes/Message.html#/s:FC13VertxEventBu.abstract: Sends back a reply to this message

Classes/EventBus/Error.html#/s:FOC13Vert.name: invalidData
Classes/EventBus/Error.html#/s:FOC13Vert.abstract: Indicates that a given JSON object can’t be converted to json text.

Classes/EventBus/Error.html#/s:FOC13Vert.name: serverError
Classes/EventBus/Error.html#/s:FOC13Vert.abstract: Indicates an error from the bridge server

Classes/EventBus/Error.html#/s:FOC13Vert.name: disconnected
Classes/EventBus/Error.html#/s:FOC13Vert.abstract: Indicates that the client is now in a disconnected state

Classes/EventBus.html#/s:FC13VertxEventB.name: connected()
Classes/EventBus.html#/s:FC13VertxEventB.abstract: Signals the current state of the connection.

Classes/EventBus.html#/s:FC13VertxEventB.name: send(to:body:headers:replyTimeout:callback:)
Classes/EventBus.html#/s:FC13VertxEventB.abstract: Sends a message to an EventBus address.

Classes/EventBus.html#/s:FC13VertxEventB.name: register(address:id:headers:handler:)
Classes/EventBus.html#/s:FC13VertxEventB.abstract: Registers a closure to receive messages for the given address.

Classes/EventBus.html#/s:FC13VertxEventB.name: unregister(address:id:headers:)
Classes/EventBus.html#/s:FC13VertxEventB.abstract: Registers a closure to receive messages for the given address.

Classes/EventBus.html#/s:FC13VertxEventB.name: register(errorHandler:)
Classes/EventBus.html#/s:FC13VertxEventB.abstract: Registers an error handler that will be passed any errors that occur in async operations.

Classes/EventBus/Error.html.name: Error
Classes/EventBus/Error.html.abstract: Represents error types thrown or passed by EventBus methods.

Classes/EventBus.html.name: EventBus
Classes/EventBus.html.abstract: Provides a connection to a remote TCP EventBus Bridge.
